Articles.Content:
Hello

I am stargazer1235. I have been playing kerbal for about 6 months after my brother showed me a video done by kurtjmac. As of today I have gone to the moon 2 times, Minnmus 1 and Duna 1. I like anything to do with space and planets. I am good at maths but not rocket science maths. I hope to make more comments on this fourm.
Welcome stargazer, I also was initially informed of the game through a kurtjmac video!
